name: Player Migration
description: This mod is designed to handle player data migration for non-official Minecraft clients. Usually, nickname change in official Minecraft clients won't change your UUID, hence server will handle nickname change without any data loss. For non-official ones, in contrary, the UUID will be changed as it is computed via nickname hashing, leading to a completely new player being logged into the server. So this mod will help ops to handle player migration when the nickname change request has come from someone.
